titles.title: Immigration Enforcement Staff Body Camera Accountability Act
Immigration Enforcement Staff Body Camera Accountability Act
To require immigration enforcement staff to wear body cameras, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Homeland Security, and in addition to the Committees on the Judiciary, and Ways and Means, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
